thread.title: Royal baby: betting odds suggest 'it's a girl'

title: Royal baby: betting odds suggest 'it's a girl'
text:
Royal baby: betting odds suggest 'it's a girl' 11:58am EDT - 01:39 
As the world awaits a third royal baby from William and Kate, betting shops in the UK are cashing in as punters gamble on the gender and the name of the newest royal. Silvia Antonioli reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
As the world awaits a third royal baby from William and Kate, betting shops in the UK are cashing in as punters gamble on the gender and the name of the newest royal. Silvia Antonioli reports.
